Name: [Hollow] Sword Catalog
Desc: Every 10 Pressure increases all squad members' attack DMG by <color=#2BAD00>2.5%</color>. (Current boost: {CReplaceCardParam:DamageShow_1001017,0.01,2}%)
Desc2: A photo album filled with famous swords. The name of each sword's owner is written thoughtfully on the back of each photo.
